remarks: Sine squared plus cosine squared is 1.  Equation 17 of [Gleason] p. 311. Note that this holds for non-real arguments, even though individually each term is unbounded.  (Contributed by NM, 15-Jan-2006.)
statement: sincossq $p |- ( A e. CC -> ( ( ( sin ` A ) ^ 2 ) + ( ( cos ` A ) ^ 2 ) ) = 1 ) $.
